name: Commoner Mob
description: A huge collection of commoners, representing the chaos of a populace, this mob relies on sheer numbers in combat.
memorable: The ability to disperse into multiple individual commoners when defeated creates a unique tactical dynamic.
goals: Overwhelm opponents through numbers and resist area attacks.
relations: Can be seen in the company of other commoners or as part of a larger riot.
environment: Typically found in urban areas or during civil unrest.
strengths: Can group together to attack multiple targets and is not affected by single-target spells.
weaknesses: Highly vulnerable to area-of-effect damage and easily reduced to weaker individual commoners.
attacks: Melee attacks with clubs and ranged attacks with stones, both capable of targeting multiple enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Mob Dispersal allows it to break apart into individual commoners upon defeat.
senses: Has a passive perception of 10, indicating average awareness.
skills: Neither exceptionally skilled nor lacking in any area, average across all abilities.
additional_information: Acts as a representation of chaotic populaces.
Each commoner created from the dispersal only has 2 hit points.
Can traverse spaces suitable for Medium creatures.
test_queries: huge group of commoners overwhelming opponents
mob that disperses into individual commoners
vulnerable humanoid mob in urban areas
commoners acting as a collective in combat
